componentType.description: Plugin displays a pong game in the AsTeRICS GUI

inputPort.description: range 0 to 300 will move paddle of player 1 to this position
range 0 to 300 will move paddle of player 2 to this position
range -10 to 10 will move paddle up or down at specified speed
range -10 to 10 will move paddle up or down at specified speed

outputPort.description: current X position of the Ball
current Y position of the Ball

eventListenerPort.description: incoming event will start the game
incoming event will switch paddle direction in event and speed controlled drive
incoming event will switch paddle direction in event and speed controlled drive
incoming event will add points/calories for player 2 (and move paddle in event controlled drive)
incoming event will add point for player 1 (and move paddle in event controlled drive)

property.name: controlMode
property.description: selects the type of drive control (position input ports, speed input ports or event ports)

property.name: speedStep
property.description: speed to be multiplied by speed input (only in speed controlled drive)

property.name: goalsToWin
property.description: how many goals to win a game

property.name: eventsToCaloryMultiplier
property.description: mapping of input events to calories (0 = deactivate calory events and screens)

property.name: goalScoreBase
property.description: Base amount of points for a goal

property.name: goalTouchBase
property.description: Base amount of points for touching the ball with the paddle

property.name: resetWaitTime
property.description: time to wait after reset of ball

property.name: minXSpeed
property.description: speed threshold for x movement to avoid stalled game

property.name: reflectionYImpulse
property.description: Base amount of y force applied to ball on touch to rectangular paddle

property.name: soundFilePaddleTouch
property.description: sound to be played when ball touches paddle

property.name: soundFileBoundsTouch
property.description: sound to be played when ball touches bounds

property.name: soundFileGoal
property.description: sound to be played when ball touches bounds

property.name: soundFileEndGame
property.description: sound to be played when game ends
